Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO DOMESTIC ANIMAL WELFARE

Title: Relates to liability for owners of dogs for injuries caused by such dog
Summary: Relates to liability for owners of dogs for injuries caused by such dog; provides liability for any injuries caused by a dog without any prior determination of propensity or dangerousness.
LawCode: Amd ยง123, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to dog attacks
